DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study demonstrate clinical effectiveness safety liraglutide dipeptidyl peptidase-4 ( DPP-4 ) inhibitor therapy routine primary care Europe .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Collection Effectiveness Safety Data From Patients Treated With Liraglutide DPP-4 Inhibitor Primary Care Europe
DOC.criteria: Patients treat liraglutide DPP4 inhibitor , accord license respective participate country data available 12 ( +/ 2 ) month Patients treat liraglutide DPP4 inhibitor , outside license respective participate country
